body:
Just pulled the latest from `develop` and now I cannot remove packages anymore which have dependents.


```
    -- linux-centos7-cascadelake / gcc@9.2.0 ------------------------
    5aalmfg m4@1.4.18%gcc  patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv
==> Do you want to proceed? [y/N] y
==> Error: unexpected error [cannot proceed uninstalling specs with remaining dependents m4]
```
title: cannot proceed uninstalling specs with remaining dependents
